attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Menu button type, which is the same as the Button component. (Valid only if split-button is true).

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Menu size. When split-button is set to true, this parameter is also valid for triggering a button. Available values (medium / small / mini)

attrs.name: split-button
attrs.desc: The drop-down trigger element is displayed as a button group. Default value: false

attrs.name: trigger
attrs.desc: Trigger drop-down behavior. The value can be hover or click. The default value is hover

attrs.name: hide-on-click
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to hide a menu after a menu item is clicked. The default value is true.

attrs.name: show-timeout
attrs.desc: Delay for expanding the drop-down list. This parameter is valid only when trigger is hover. Default value: 250 ms

attrs.name: hide-timeout
attrs.desc: Delay for collapsing the drop-down list. This parameter is valid only when trigger is hover. Default value: 150 ms

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Whether to disable the function. Default value: false

attrs.name: visible-arrow
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to display arrows. The default value is not displayed

attrs.name: title
attrs.desc: When the default slot is not used, the menu title can be configured in the title attribute.

attrs.name: inherit-width
attrs.desc: The default value is false. When this parameter is set to true, the minimum width of the dialog box inherits the width of the trigger source.

slots.name: default
slots.desc: Element that triggers the display of the drop-down list. Note: The value must be an element or component.

events.name: button-click
events.desc: When split-button is set to true, click the callback function of the button on the left.

events.name: item-click
events.desc: Callback triggered by clicking a menu item.

events.name: visible-change
events.desc: This event is triggered when the drop-down list box is displayed or hidden.

dropdownMenuattrs.name: placement
dropdownMenuattrs.desc: Menu pop-up position. The value can be (top/top-start/top-end/bottom/bottom-start/bottom-end). The default value is bottom-end

dropdownMenuattrs.name: options
dropdownMenuattrs.desc: Setting the properties of a menu item using a profile

dropdownMenuattrs.name: textField
dropdownMenuattrs.desc: Used together with the options attribute to specify the copywriting field of a menu item. The default field is label.

dropdownMenuslots.name: default
dropdownMenuslots.desc: The drop-down list is usually a <tiny-dropdown-item> component.

dropdownItemattrs.name: divided
dropdownItemattrs.desc: Displays the split line. Default value: false

dropdownItemattrs.name: label
dropdownItemattrs.desc: Display value of a menu item

dropdownItemslots.name: default
dropdownItemslots.desc: The options in the drop-down list box are displayed.
